column5: We will get up there this year,might have to break alittle ice to get the boats going

Got out for a solo trip to Cedar Lake.It was a muskie mission.Pretty much every place a cast i had a follow up but tgey were all lazy fish.All around tge 35" mark except for one in the mid 40,s.Enjoyed the day. Water temps were 70 f going across the lake so its getting warm.Looked like a huge mayfly explosion to.They were all over.I fished 2 walleye spots but stuck to rock dropoffs and got my 4 fairly quick.Got a day planned for Eagle today with my wife and ìmagine tge hatch will be happening tgere to but we will mainly concentrate on muskies again and they will be lazy again but we dont care.Going to be another hot one and little wind.There are some beautifull beaches on Eagle and iam sure we will end up on one.
Another fish pole tease, eh, John? You really made it difficult to look at (don't stop)! Thanks for the update. Hope to be up there late September, maybe will be open by then...... Bill
Sure hope so Bill.I need a American fix to.lol.This is getting ridiculous.July definately out.Need to hear something positive for a change.
Another ho hum day fishing for you Mr.jakobs,I shed a tear every time you post,I guess the March American fix is already wore off,I'm sure you could use some Ben franklins also my friend,rod
I love Ben Franklin.lol.Yeah would love some if them. You and Rob were the last americans ive seen since march at Clarks.Been a very dry spell for me and not expecting things to change anytime soon.

It's a waiting game now,hope you can get some fall clients john be better than nothing,I hoping to be fishing when the moose hunters are out,great time of the year as far as I'm concerned,I should have left you a Ben Franklin when I left so you don't forget what they look like lol,sounds like bill wants to hook up with you to reef on some fall crappies

I still have some of them at home.lol.Bill and i always miss each other when hes up.Hope ĺate season something happens.need a american fix now.lol.moose time is some great fishing.Can get cool to but who cares.

I haven't had any problem getting crappie, sometimes 100/day/person, but I'd just like to sit around and bs a little with John. Maybe have a pop or 3, been talking on WC for some years, never have had a person to person, but feel like we know each other pretty well. We'll see what this year brings. Or doesn't bring. Bill

Got a strange feeling Bill that this is not the year we are going to meet up.there will be many crappies around next year as except for the 30 of them my wife and i brought home that's about all that has come out of the lake so far this year.ill get some more yet this year and around fall. Every species in the lake is getting a holiday this year.

I read Prov's reports even though it's an emotional roller coaster. I'm just happy some one is up there to enjoy the fishing. Most of us will not get to Canada this year, and your updates are the only way we are going to get our fix. good luck and thank you.
